column4: can someone give me some one on one help w/ getting to my xp shared folder on my lan?
: on the ubu machine, under places, can you see the win pc ? how are they connected ?
: have u got the ip of the win machine ?
: is there a firewall on the win machine ? is it set to be shown in Network (the win box?)
there is a firewall up and i believe i can share (i succesfully did it w/ vista and xp w/ same settings)
yeah file and print sharing is enabled
i can see the windows network but when i open it theres nothing there and i can ping it
the shared folder is on my desktop, do i have to move it someplace to see it on ubuntu?
